column1: S0212.CARD.  1. CARD ONE
S0212.DECK.  212. SURVEY NUMBER
S0212.BALLOT.  X. BALLOT NUMBER GENERATED BY ROPER CENTER.
S0212.Q1. WHAT IS YOUR ARMY RANK OR GRADE?  1. PRIVATE OR PRIVATE FIRST CLASS 2. CORPORAL OR TECHNICIAN 5TH GRADE 3. SERGEANT OR TECHNICIAN 4TH GRADE 4. 1ST THREE GRADER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q2. HOW OLD WERE YOU ON YOUR LAST BIRTHDAY?  1. 19 YEARS OR YOUNGER 2. 20-24 YEARS 3. 25-29 YEARS 4. 30-34 YEARS 5. 35-39 YEARS 6. 40 YEARS OR OVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q3. HOW FAR DID YOU GO IN SCHOOL?  1. DID NOT FINISH GRADE SCHOOL 2. GRADUATED FROM GRADE SCHOOL 3. SOME HIGH SCHOOL BUT DID NOT GRADUATE 4. GRADUATED FROM HIGH SCHOOL 5. WENT TO COLLEGE 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q4. HOW LONG HAVE YOU BEEN IN THE ARMY? E. IF YOU HAVE SERVED PREVIOUSLY IN THE ARMY, CHECK THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOU ENTERED THIS LAST TIME. IF YOU WERE A NATIONAL GUARDSMAN GIVE THE LENGTH OF TIME SINCE YOUR OUTFIT ENTERED THE ARMY.  1. 3 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 3 MONTHS UP TO 6 MONTHS 3. OVER 6 MONTHS UP TO 1 YEAR 4. OVER 1 YEAR UP TO 2 YEARS 5. OVER 2 YEARS UP TO 3 YEARS 6. OVER 3 YEARS UP TO 4 YEARS 7. OVER 4 YEARS 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q5. HOW DID YOU COME INTO THE ARMY?  1. I VOLUNTEERED FOR THE REGULAR ARMY 2. I VOLUNTEERED THROUGH THE SELECTIVE SERVICE 3. I WAS IN THE NATIONAL GUARD 4. I WAS DRAFTED 5. SOME OTHER WAY 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q6. WHAT BRANCH OF THE ARMY ARE YOU IN NOW?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q7. WERE YOU EVER OVERSEAS OR STATIONED OUTSIDE OF THE 48 STATES IN THIS WAR?  1. YES 2. NO I. IF YOU WERE OVERSEAS IN THIS WAR OR STATIONED OUTSIDE OF THE 48 STATES, ANSWER THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS, IF NOT SKIP TO QUESTION 19.

S0212.Q8. HOW LONG WERE YOU OVERSEAS? (COUNT FROM THE TIME YOU LEFT THE STATES UNTIL YOU RETURNED)  1. 12 MONTHS OR LESS 2. OVER 12 MONTHS UP TO 18 MONTHS 3. OVER 18 MONTHS UP TO 24 MONTHS 4. OVER 24 MONTHS UP TO 30 MONTHS 5. OVER 30 MONTHS UP TO 36 MONTHS 6. OVER 36 MONTHS 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q9. WERE YOU SENT BACK TO THE STATES UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN OR FOR SOME OTHER REASON?  1. I WAS SENT BACK UNDER THE ROTATION PLAN 2. I WAS SENT BACK WOUNDED 3. I WAS SENT BACK BECAUSE OF NERVOUSNESS 4. I WAS SENT BACK FOR SOME OTHER REASON 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q10. IN WHAT OVERSEAS THEATER OR AREA DID YOU LAST SERVE?  01. EUROPEAN THEATRE (BRITISH ISLES, FRANCE, GERMANY) 02. MEDITERRANEAN THEATRE (ITALY, NORTH AFRICA) 03. CARIBBEAN, PANAMA 04. SOUTHWEST PACIFIC AREA (AUSTRALIA, NEW GUINEA, PHILIPPINES) 05. SOUTH PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (NEW CALEDONIA, GUADALCANAL, ETC.) 06. CENTRAL PACIFIC BASE COMMAND (HAWAII, KWAJALEIN, SAIPAN, ETC.) 07. ALASKA, ALEUTIANS 08. MIDDLE EAST (CAIRO, PALESTINE, IRAN) 09. CHINA, BURMA, INDIA 10. OTHER PLACE 00. NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE
S0212.Q11. WAS THIS THE OVERSEAS THEATER OR AREA YOU SERVED IN LONGEST?  1. YES 2. NO 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q12. HAVE YOU BEEN IN COMBAT OR UNDER ENEMY FIRE IN THIS WAR?  1. YES, I HAVE BEEN IN ACTUAL COMBAT 2. YES, I HAVE BEEN UNDER ENEMY FIRE, BUT NOT IN ACTUAL COMBAT 3. NO 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q13. WHAT WAS THE BRANCH OF SERVICE THAT YOU WERE LAST IN WHILE YOU WERE OVERSEAS?  01. ENGINEERS 02. FIELD ARTILLERY 03. QUARTERMASTER CORPS 04. INFANTRY 05. MEDICAL DEPARTMENT 06. ARMORED FORCE AND TANK DESTROYER 07. SIGNAL CORPS 08. COAST ARTILLERY AND ANTI-AIRCRAFT 09. AIR CORPS 10. TRANSPORTATION CORPS 11. ORDNANCE DEPARTMENT 12. CHEMICAL WARFARE SERVICE 13. MILITARY POLICE 14. DEML (STATION COMPLEMENT) 15. OTHER 00. NO ANSWER, INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q14. WHEN DID YOU GET BACK TO LAND IN THE U.S.* (GIVE THE MONTH AND YEAR IN WHICH YOU ACTUALLY ARRIVED BACK IN THE U.S.)  01. NOVEMBER 1943 OR EARLIER 02. DECEMBER 1943, JANUARY, FEBRUARY, MARCH, APRIL, MAY 1944 03. JUNE, JULY, AUGUST 1944 04. SEPTEMBER, OCTOBER, NOVEMBER 1944 05. DECEMBER 1944 06. JANUARY 1945 07. FEBRUARY 1945 08. MARCH 1945 09. APRIL 1945 10. MAY 1945 OR LATER 00. NO ANSWER 99. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q15A. HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT SERVING OVERSEAS AGAIN?  1. I WANT TO GET OVERSEAS AGAIN AS SOON AS POSSIBLE 2. I'M READY TO GO WHENEVER I'M NEEDED 3. I'D LIKE TO STAY IN THE U.S. FOR A FEW MONTHS, BUT THEN I'LL BE READY TO GO ANYWHERE 4. I DON'T WANT TO GO OVERSEAS AGAIN 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE X. QUESTION 15B NOT CODED.

S0212.Q16. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU WANT TO DO, DO YOU THINK YOU ACTUALLY WILL BE SENT TO SOME OVERSEAS THEATER AGAIN?  1. I AM VERY SURE I'LL BE SENT OVER AGAIN 2. I AM FAIRLY SURE I'LL BE SENT OVER AGAIN 3. THE CHANCES ARE ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 4. I AM FAIRLY SURE I'LL NOT BE SENT OVER AGAIN 5. I AM VERY SURE I'LL NOT BE SENT OVER AGAIN 6. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q17. KNOWING WHAT YOU DO NOW, HOW DO YOU FEEL ABOUT HAVING COME BACK TO THE U.S.*  1. I WISH I HADN'T COME BACK 2. I WOULD RATHER HAVE COME BACK JUST FOR A FURLOUGH AND THEN RETURNED TO MY OLD OUTFIT OVERSEAS 3. I AM GLAD I CAME BACK 4. SOMETHING ELSE 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE

S0212.Q18. ARE YOU IN THE ARMY JOB YOU THOUGHT YOU MIGHT GET WHEN YOU WERE CLASSIFIED AT THE REDISTRIBUTION STATION?  1. YES 2. NO 3. I NEVER WENT THROUGH A REDISTRIBUTION STATION 0. NO ANSWER 9. INAPPLICABLE
S0212.Q19. HOW SATISFIED OR DISSATISFIED ARE YOU WITH YOUR PRESENT ARMY JOB?  1. VERY SATISFIED 2. SATISFIED 3. DISSATISFIED 4. VERY DISSATISFIED 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q20. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF PHYSICAL CONDITION WOULD YOU SAY YOU ARE IN AT THE PRESENT TIME?  1. VERY GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 2. GOOD PHYSICAL CONDITION 3. FAIR PHYSICAL CONDITION 4. POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 5. VERY POOR PHYSICAL CONDITION 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21A. ARE YOU EVER TROUBLED BY YOUR HANDS SWEATING SO THAT THEY FEEL DAMP AND CLAMMY?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21B. HOW OFTEN ARE YOU BOTHERED BY HAVING AN UPSET STOMACH?  1. NEARLY ALL THE TIME 2. PRETTY OFTEN 3. NOT VERY OFTEN 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21C. DO YOU OFTEN HAVE TROUBLE IN GETTING TO SLEEP OR STAYING ASLEEP?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ALMOST NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21D. DO YOUR HANDS EVER TREMBLE ENOUGH TO BOTHER YOU?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21E. ARE YOU EVER BOTHERED BY NERVOUSNESS?  1. YES, OFTEN 2. YES, SOMETIMES 3. NO, NEVER 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21F. ARE YOU EVER WORRIED AND UPSET?  1. I AM HARDLY EVER WORRIED AND UPSET 2. I AM SOMETIMES WORRIED AND UPSET 3. I AM OFTEN WORRIED AND UPSET 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q21G. IN GENERAL, WHAT SORT OF A TIME DO YOU HAVE IN THE ARMY?  1. I HAVE A PRETTY GOOD TIME 2. ITS ABOUT FIFTY-FIFTY 3. I HAVE A PRETTY ROTTEN TIME 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q21H. IN GENERAL, HOW WOULD YOU SAY YOU FEEL MOST OF THE TIME, IN GOOD SPIRITS OR IN LOW SPIRITS?  1. I AM USUALLY IN GOOD SPIRITS 2. I AM IN GOOD SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME IN LOW SPIRITS SOME OF THE TIME 3. I AM USUALLY IN LOW SPIRITS 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q22. DO YOU EVER GET THE FEELING THAT THIS WAR WAS NOT WORTH FIGHTING?  1. VERY OFTEN 2. SOMETIMES 3. ONLY ONCE IN A GREAT WHILE 4. NEVER 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q23. DO YOU THINK THAT AFTER THIS WAR, PEACE TERMS WILL BE WORKED OUT THAT YOU WILL THINK ARE GOOD ONES?  1. I'M VERY SURE THE PEACE TERMS WILL BE GOOD ONES 2. I'M FAIRLY SURE THEY WILL BE 3. I'M NOT SO SURE THEY WILL BE 4. I'M NOT AT ALL SURE THEY WILL BE 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q24A. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THE DIFFERENT COUNTRIES (LIKE THE UNITED STATES, RUSSIA, ENGLAND, CHINA, FRANCE, ETC.) SHOULD SET UP A PERMANENT ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS TO TRY TO SETTLE QUARRELS BETWEEN COUNTRIES AND TRY TO PREVENT WAR?  1. SHOULD BE SET UP 2. SHOULD NOT BE SET UP 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q24B. DO YOU THINK SUCH AN INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION ACTUALLY WILL BE SET UP OR NOT?  1. I THINK ONE ACTUALLY WILL BE SET UP 2. I DON'T THINK ONE WILL BE SET UP 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q25A. READ THE TWO STATEMENTS BELOW AND CHECK THE ONE WHICH YOU THINK SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE U.S.  1. "TO SEE THAT THE NATIONS ORGANIZE TO PREVENT WARS IN THE FUTURE" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE U.S. IS SO STRONG THAT NO NATIONS WOULD DARE ATTACK US" 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q25B. NOW READ THESE TWO STATEMENTS AND CHECK THE ONE YOU THINK SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE U.S.  1. "TO SEE THAT THE PEOPLE IN ALL COUNTRIES HAVE THE RIGHT TO GOVERN THEMSELVES" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE NATIONS ORGANIZE TO PREVENT WARS IN THE FUTURE" 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q25C. NOW CHECK WHICH ONE OF THESE TWO STATEMENTS SHOULD BE THE MORE IMPORTANT PEACE AIM FOR THE U.S.  1. "TO SEE THAT THE PEOPLE IN ALL COUNTRIES HAVE THE RIGHT TO GOVERN THEMSELVES" 2. "TO SEE THAT THE U.S. IS SO STRONG THAT NO NATIONS WOULD DARE ATTACK US" 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q0. NOT USED  Y. COL. 48 NOT USED. X. Q.26 CODED ON CARD 3: COLS. 74-77.

S0212.Q27A. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD JOIN A STRONG PERMANENT ORGANIZATION OF NATIONS, EVEN IF IT MEANS THAT THIS ORGANIZATION WOULD HAVE SOME SAY ABOUT HOW THE UNITED STATES DEALS WITH OTHER COUNTRIES?  1. YES, I THINK THE U.S. SHOULD JOIN 2. NO, I DON'T THINK THE U.S. SHOULD JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q27B. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES ACTUALLY WILL JOIN SUCH AN ORGANIZATION IF IT IS SET UP?  1. YES, I THINK THE U.S. WILL JOIN 2. NO, I DON'T THINK THE U.S. WILL JOIN 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q28A. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THERE SHOULD BE A SPECIAL FORCE OF SOLDIERS FROM THE ARMIES OF A NUMBER OF DIFFERENT COUNTRIES THAT COULD BE SENT ANY PLACE THE INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION DECIDED THEY WERE NEEDED?  1. YES, THERE SHOULD BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY OF THAT KIND 2. NO, THERE SHOULD NOT BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY OF THAT KIND 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q28B. DO YOU THINK THERE ACTUALLY WILL BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY LIKE THAT SET UP OR NOT?  1. YES, I THINK THERE ACTUALLY WILL BE AN INTERNATIONAL ARMY OF THAT KIND 2. NO, THERE PROBABLY WILL NOT BE ONE SET UP 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q29. AFTER THE WAR, SOME OF OUR ALLIES WILL NEED HELP IN FEEDING THEIR PEOPLE. DO YOU THINK THE UNITED STATES SHOULD SEND FOOD TO THESE COUNTRIES EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT WE WOULD HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN OUR OWN COUNTRY FOR A WHILE TO DO IT?  1. WE SHOULD SEND FOOD AFTER THE WAR, EVEN IF WE HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN THE U.S. IN ORDER TO DO IT 2. WE SHOULD NOT SEND FOOD IF IT MEANS WE HAVE TO KEEP ON RATIONING FOOD IN THE U.S. IN ORDER TO DO IT 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q30. AFTER THE WAR, SOME OF OUR ALLIES WILL NEED MONEY AND MATERIALS TO HELP THEM GET BACK ON THEIR FEET. DO YOU THINK WE SHOULD LET THEM HAVE MONEY AND MATERIALS TO HELP THEM GET BACK ON THEIR FEET, EVEN IF IT MEANT THAT WE SHOULD HAVE TO PAY HIGHER TAXES TO DO IT?  1. WE SHOULD HELP THEM WITH MONEY AND MATERIALS AFTER THE WAR, EVEN IF IT MEANS HIGHER TAXES FOR US 2. WE SHOULD NOT HELP THEM WITH MONEY AND MATERIALS AFTER THE WAR IF IT MEANS HIGHER TAXES FOR US 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q31A. DO YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR IN THE NEXT 25 YEARS OR SO?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  1. ARGENTINA 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  18 1. CHINA 2502 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  50 1. JAPAN 2470 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  843 1. RUSSIA 1677 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  73 1. UNITED STATES 2447 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  20 1. OTHER 2500 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31B. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHAT COUNTRY DO YOU THINK WILL BE MOST TO BLAME FOR IT?  1100 1. NO ANSWER 1420 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31C. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK WILL BE FIGHTING WHOM? E. ARGENTINA WILL BE FIGHTING:  1. CHINA 2. NOT CHOSEN
S0212.Q31C. IF YOU THINK THERE WILL BE ANOTHER WAR, WHO DO YOU THINK WILL BE FIGHTING WHOM? E. ARGENTINA WILL BE FIGHTING:  7 1. ENGLAND 2513 2. NOT CHOSEN

S0212.Q32. DO YOU EXPECT WE PROBABLY WILL HAVE A WIDESPREAD DEPRESSION IN THE UNITED STATES WITHIN 10 YEARS AFTER THE WAR IS OVER, OR DO YOU THINK WE PROBABLY WILL AVOID HAVING ONE?  1. WE WILL PROBABLY HAVE A DEPRESSION 2. WE WILL PROBABLY AVOID HAVING ONE 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q33. CHECK THE ONE STATEMENT BELOW THAT COMES CLOSEST TO EXPRESSING HOW YOU FEEL TOWARD GERMAN LEADERS.  1. I HAVE A STRONG HATRED TOWARDS GERMAN LEADERS 2. I HAVE A GREAT DISLIKE FOR THEM, BUT DON'T HATE THEM 3. SOMETIMES I HAVE STRONG FEELINGS AGAINST THEM, SOMETIMES NO PARTICULAR FEELINGS 4. I DON'T HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT THEM 5. I FEEL THEY ARE LIKE US AND HAVE DONE WHAT THEY THOUGHT WAS THEIR DUTY 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q34. CHECK THE ONE STATEMENT BELOW THAT COMES CLOSEST TO EXPRESSING HOW YOU FEEL TOWARD GERMAN COMMON PEOPLE.  1. I HAVE A STRONG HATRED TOWARDS GERMAN COMMON PEOPLE 2. I HAVE A GREAT DISLIKE FOR THEM, BUT DON'T HATE THEM 3. SOMETIMES I HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT THEM, SOMETIMES NO PARTICULAR FEELINGS 4. I DON'T HAVE ANY STRONG FEELINGS ABOUT THEM 5. I FEEL THEY ARE LIKE US AND HAVE DONE WHAT THEY THOUGHT WAS THEIR DUTY 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q35. SOME FEEL THAT GERMANY SHOULD BE GOVERNED BY AN OCCUPATION FORCE FOR SOME YEARS TO COME, WHILE OTHERS FEEL THAT GERMANY SHOULD BE GOVERNED ONLY UNTIL NAZIS ARE CRUSHED AND A NEW GOVERNMENT SET UP. WITH WHICH DO YOU AGREE?  1. GOVERN GERMANY WITH AN OCCUPATION FORCE FOR SOME YEARS TO COME 2. GOVERN GERMANY ONLY UNTIL NAZIS ARE CRUSHED AND A NEW GOVERNMENT SET UP 3. DON'T KNOW 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q36. DO YOU THINK THAT THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE ARE TO BLAME FOR STARTING THE WAR, OR DO YOU THINK THAT IT IS REALLY JUST THE GROUP OF NAZI MILITARISTIC LEADERS WHO ARE TO BLAME?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE ARE TO BLAME AS WELL AS THEIR LEADERS 2. MOST OF THE ORDINARY GERMANS ARE TO BLAME, BUT SOME OF THEM COULDN'T HELP WHAT THEIR LEADERS DID 3. FEW OF THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE ARE TO BLAME, IT WAS MOSTLY THE FAULT OF THEIR LEADERS 4. ALMOST NONE OF THE ORDINARY GERMAN PEOPLE ARE TO BLAME, IT WAS JUST THEIR LEADERS 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q37. ABOUT HOW MANY OF THE GERMAN PEOPLE DO YOU THINK CAN BE EDUCATED AWAY FROM NAZISM AND TAUGHT TO REALLY THINK AND ACT LIKE DEMOCRATIC PEOPLE?  1. ALMOST ALL OF THEM 2. MOST OF THEM 3. ABOUT HALF OF THEM 4. FEW OF THEM 5. ALMOST NONE OF THEM 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q38. DO YOU THINK GERMANY WILL EVER AGAIN BE A NATION THAT WE CAN TRUST AND TREAT AS AN EQUAL?  1. YES 2. NO 3. DON'T KNOW 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0212.Q39. HOW LONG DO YOU THINK IT WOULD TAKE BEFORE WE COULD TRUST AND TREAT GERMANY AS AN EQUAL?  1. SOMEWHERE BETWEEN 1 AND 5 YEARS 2. SOMEWHERE BETWEEN 5 AND 10 YEARS 3. SOMEWHERE BETWEEN 10 AND 20 YEARS 4. SOMEWHERE BETWEEN 20 AND 30 YEARS 5. MORE THAN 30 YEARS 6. I HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 7. GERMANY WILL NEVER BE A NATION WE CAN TRUST AND TREAT AS AN EQUAL 0. NO ANSWER

ANP (ACTUAL NUMBER) 01. 1 POINT . . . 89. 89 POINTS 90. 90-99 POINTS 91.100-109 POINTS 92.110-119 POINTS 93.120 POINTS OR OVER 94.I DON'T KNOW WHAT MY POINT SCORE IS 95.NO ANSWER 00.NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0212.Q41A. IN GENERAL, DO YOU THINK THE ARMY HAS TRIED ITS BEST TO SEE THAT MEN GET AS SQUARE A DEAL AS POSSIBLE?  1. YES, IT HAS TRIED ITS BEST 2. IT HAS TRIED SOME BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT HAS HARDLY TRIED AT ALL 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0212.Q41B. IN GENERAL, DO YOU FEEL YOU YOURSELF HAVE GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL FROM THE ARMY?  1. YES, IN MOST WAYS I HAVE 2. IN SOME WAYS, YES, IN OTHER WAYS, NO 3. NO, ON THE WHOLE I HAVEN'T GOTTEN A SQUARE DEAL 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q42. DO YOU THINK THE ARMY IS TRYING ITS BEST TO SEE THAT THE MEN WHO HAVE THE HARD AND DANGEROUS JOBS GET THE SPECIAL CONSIDERATION AND BREAKS THEY DESERVE?  1. YES, IT IS TRYING ITS BEST 2. IT IS TRYING SOME, BUT NOT HARD ENOUGH 3. IT IS HARDLY TRYING AT ALL 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q43. DO YOU THINK WHEN YOU ARE DISCHARGED YOU WILL GO BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE WITH A FAVORABLE OR UNFAVORABLE ATTITUDE TOWARD THE ARMY?  1. VERY FAVORABLE 2. FAIRLY FAVORABLE 3. ABOUT 50-50 4. FAIRLY UNFAVORABLE 5. VERY UNFAVORABLE 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q44. DO YOU THINK YOU WILL BE NEEDED OVERSEAS IN ORDER TO HELP BEAT JAPAN?  1. YES, ALMOST IMMEDIATELY 2. YES, BUT NOT FOR QUITE A WHILE 3. NO 4. HAVEN'T ANY IDEA 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q45. DO YOU THINK THAT IN FINISHING THE WAR AGAINST JAPAN WE WILL DEPEND MAINLY ON NAVY AND AIR FORCES, OR DO YOU THINK WE WILL NEED TO USE A LOT MORE GROUND FORCES THAN WE ALREADY HAVE IN THE PACIFIC?  1. WE ALREADY HAVE ENOUGH GROUND FORCES IN THE PACIFIC NOW 2. WE WILL NEED SOMEWHAT MORE GROUND FORCES IN THE PACIFIC THAN WE NOW HAVE THERE 3. WE WILL NEED A LOT MORE GROUND FORCES IN THE PACIFIC THAN WE NOW HAVE THERE 4. NO ANSWER 0. NO CODE OR NO DATA

S0212.Q46. IF YOU HAVE TO BE STATIONED OVERSEAS UNTIL AFTER JAPAN SURRENDERS, WHICH OF THE FOLLOWING WOULD YOU PREFER AS AN ASSIGNMENT?  1. GO TO ETO (AS PART OF THE FORCES OCCUPYING GERMANY) 2. GO TO THE PACIFIC, IN MY PRESENT KIND OF JOB 3. GO TO THE PACIFIC, BUT IN A DIFFERENT KIND OF JOB THAN I NOW HAVE 4. IT DOESN'T MAKE ANY DIFFERENCE TO ME 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q47. SOME SOLDIERS FEEL THEY'VE ALREADY DONE THEIR SHARE IN WINNING THE WAR. OTHERS FEEL THEY SHOULD DO STILL MORE. HOW DO YOU PERSONALLY FEEL ABOUT WHAT YOU'VE DONE IN THIS WAR?  1. I DON'T FEEL I'VE DONE MY SHARE YET 2. I FEEL I'VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE, BUT I'M READY TO DO MORE BUT NOT IN A COMBAT JOB 3. I FEEL I HAVE DONE MY SHARE, BUT I'M READY TO DO MORE IN ANY KIND OF JOB THEY ASSIGN ME TO 4. I FEEL I'VE ALREADY DONE MY SHARE AND SHOULD BE DISCHARGED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q48. DO YOU THINK THERE ARE ENOUGH ABLE-BODIED SOLDIERS STILL IN THE STATES SO THAT MEN WHO HAVE SERVED OVERSEAS FOR 18 MONTHS OR MORE SHOULD NOT HAVE TO GO TO THE PACIFIC?  1. NO, I DON'T BELIEVE THERE ARE ENOUGH IN THE STATES 2. THERE ARE ENOUGH IN THE STATES TO REPLACE THE COMBAT MEN, BUT NOT TO REPLACE THE NON-COMBAT MEN OVERSEAS 3. THERE ARE ENOUGH IN THE STATES TO REPLACE BOTH THE COMBAT AND THE NON-COMBAT MEN 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 49 NOT CODED.

S0212.Q50A. ARE THERE ANY IMPORTANT CHANGES THAT YOU THINK SHOULD BE MADE TO IMPROVE OUR AMERICAN WAY OF LIFE AFTER THE WAR?  1. NO IMPORTANT CHANGES SHOULD BE MADE 2. A FEW IMPORTANT CHANGES SHOULD BE MADE 3. A GOOD MANY IMPORTANT CHANGES SHOULD BE MADE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER X. QUESTION 50B NOT CODED.

S0212.Q51. REGARDLESS OF WHAT YOU THINK SHOULD BE DONE, DO YOU THINK ANY IMPORTANT CHANGES IN AMERICAN LIFE ACTUALLY WILL BE MADE?  1. NO IMPORTANT CHANGES ACTUALLY WILL BE MADE 2. A FEW IMPORTANT CHANGES ACTUALLY WILL BE MADE 3. A GOOD MANY IMPORTANT CHANGES ACTUALLY WILL BE MADE 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q52. AFTER THE WAR DO YOU THINK THAT MOST SOLDIERS WILL FIND IT EASY OR HARD TO GET THE KIND OF JOBS THEY WANT?  1. VERY EASY 2. FAIRLY EASY 3. FAIRLY HARD 4. VERY HARD 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q53. HOW ABOUT YOU YOURSELF, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL FIND IT EASY OR HARD TO GET THE KIND OF JOB YOU WANT?  1. VERY EASY 2. FAIRLY EASY 3. FAIRLY HARD 4. VERY HARD 5. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q54. AFTER THE WAR, DO YOU THINK SOLDIERS SHOULD BE GIVEN FIRST CHOICE OF THE JOBS THAT ARE OPEN, OR DO YOU THINK EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE AN EQUAL CHANCE TO GET JOBS?  1. SOLDIERS SHOULD GET FIRST CHOICE 2. EVERYBODY SHOULD HAVE AN EQUAL CHANCE 3. SOME OTHER IDEA 4. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55A....ABOUT WHAT KIND OF WORK YOU SHOULD GO INTO AFTER THE WAR?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55B....ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL BE ABLE TO GET A JOB AFTER THE WAR?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55C....ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL STILL BE ABLE TO DO THE KIND OF WORK YOU HAD PLANNED TO DO AS A LIFE WORK?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q55D....ABOUT WHETHER YOU AND YOUR WIFE OR SWEETHEART AFTER THE WAR WILL BE ABLE TO GET ALONG TOGETHER AS WELL AS BEFORE THE WAR?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55E....ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL BE ABLE TO SETTLE DOWN WHEN YOU GET BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55F....ABOUT WHETHER YOU WILL GET AS GOOD A BREAK AS OTHER SOLDIERS IN GETTING DISCHARGED FROM THE ARMY?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55G....ABOUT WHETHER THE U.S. WILL STILL BE A DEMOCRACY AFTER THE WAR?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55H....ABOUT WHETHER YOUR FAMILY AND FRIENDS WILL THINK YOU DID WELL IN THE ARMY?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q55I....ABOUT WHAT WILL HAPPEN TO THE WORLD AFTER THE WAR?  1. WORRY A LOT 2. WORRY A LITTLE 3. ALMOST NEVER WORRY 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q56. AFTER YOU GO BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL VOTE MORE OFTEN OR LESS OFTEN THAN YOU DID BEFORE THE WAR?  1. THINK I WILL VOTE MORE OFTEN THAN I DID 2. THINK I WILL VOTE LESS OFTEN THAN I DID 3. ABOUT THE SAME AMOUNT AS BEFORE THE WAR 4. I WAS TOO YOUNG TO VOTE BEFORE THE WAR 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q57A. IN THE YEARS BEFORE THE WAR, HOW MUCH INTEREST DID YOU TAKE IN READING AND FOLLOWING THE NEWS ABOUT WHAT THE GOVERNMENT WAS DOING, WHAT PROBLEMS AND ISSUES WERE BEING DISCUSSED IN CONGRESS, AND SO FORTH?  1. I ALMOST ALWAYS FOLLOWED SUCH NEWS 2. I FOLLOWED SUCH NEWS FAIRLY OFTEN 3. I DIDN'T FOLLOW SUCH NEWS VERY OFTEN 4. I HARDLY EVER FOLLOWED SUCH NEWS 0. NO ANSWER

S0212.Q57B. AFTER YOU GO BACK TO CIVILIAN LIFE, DO YOU THINK YOU WILL PROBABLY BE MORE INTERESTED OR LESS INTERESTED IN READING AND FOLLOWING SUCH NEWS THAN YOU WERE BEFORE THE WAR?  1. THINK I'LL PROBABLY BE MORE INTERESTED THAN I WAS BEFORE THE WAR 2. THINK I'LL PROBABLY TAKE ABOUT THE SAME INTEREST AS I DID BEFORE THE WAR 3. THINK I'LL PROBABLY BE LESS INTERESTED THAN I WAS BEFORE THE WAR 0. NO ANSWER
S0212.Q58. DO YOU THINK THE GOVERNMENT IS DOING ABOUT EVERYTHING IT CAN TO SEE THAT THE WAR WILL BE OVER AS SOON AS POSSIBLE?  1. YES 2. NO 3. UNDECIDED 0. NO ANSWER
